mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM(ITEM_NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY_ID, STOCK) VALUES (#{itemName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{categoryId}, #{stock})
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, STOCK FROM ITEM I ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC
SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_NAME, I.PRICE, I.DESCRIPTION, I.STOCK, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM ITEM I INNER JOIN CATEGORY C ON I.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE I.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_IMG(PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, FILESYSTEM_NAME, HAS_THUMBNAIL, ITEM_ID) VALUES(#{path}, #{originName}, #{filesystemName}, #{hasThumbnail}, #{itemId})

INSERT INTO ITEM_IMG_DETAIL(PATH_DETAIL, ORIGIN_DETAIL_NAME, FILESYSTEM_DETAIL_NAME, HAS_DETAIL_THUMBNAIL, ITEM_ID) VALUES(#{pathDetail}, #{originDetailName}, #{filesystemDetailName}, #{hasDetailThumbnail}, #{itemId})
